name: URL Regex
description: A PostHog plugin to regex url strings in your application to remove strings such as UIDs.

config.markdown: Regex urls in your application to remove all unwanted clutter from URLs such as UIDs. By default, unwanted elements are replaced by an underscore (_)

config.name: Regex String
config.hint: Enter the Regex String to be used

config.name: Regex Flag
config.hint: Add flags as desired. Default value is global(g)

config.name: Replacement
config.hint: Enter the replacement String to be used
